docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: When faced with the most serious crisis so far as Commissioner of the Food and Drug Administration, Frank E. Young found solace in the Bible. Turning to the Book of Romans, Dr. Young produced a quote that summed up his thoughts: ''All have sinned and fallen short of the glory of God.''

headline.main: A Scandal Raises Serious Questions at the F.D.A.
